phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Asta and Yuno were able to get through its grueling selection process.
Please allow me to join the Golden Dawn.
And since you have no magical powers, no one wants you.
I am still going to become the Wizard King someday!
Both Asta and Yuno successfully joined
the Magic Knights and took their first steps toward becoming the Wizard King.
I am Asta from Hage Village!
I will be joining the Black Bulls tod
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
So you are our new member this year?
You are neither a royal nor a noble,
but a peasant from the boonies, and he let you join our squad.
What in the world is Captain Vangeance thinking?
Do not get a big head just because all the captains raised their hands
You will not be accepted as a member of the Golden Dawn that easily.
I will see to it that you accept me soon.
That is some mouth you have.
I am not... but let us do this!
Ugh, I drank way too much.
You are as adorable as an angel again today, my little sister Marie.
I see they are at it again.
B-But starting today, I am also a member of the Black Bulls.
I am Asta from Hage Village!
It is a pleasure to meet all of you!
I am going to be the Wizard King!
That pudding you were saving sure was delicious.
That is going to be your last supper!
What if this ruckus you curs are causing wakes up my little sister, you dumbasses?!
I remember up to when I started a drinking contest with some old guy.
They are not listening at all!
You are not helping my headache!
Wh-Wh-Wh-Wh-Who are you calling a virgin delinquent?!
If you look away, I am going to kill you.
I told you guys to shut up!
In the name of my angelic sister, Marie, I will kill you all!
Yet he just destroyed the wall!
Thanks for all your hard work, Mister Yami!
Do you have a moment, Captain?
Mister Yami, did anyone get too uppity with you?
If they did, I will kill them!
C'mon, just ignore these brats and drink with me.
I have reached my limit, so can I go see my sister now?
So you guys love me that much, eh?
But you need to shut up.
Why are you fooling around over there?
This little shrimp is our other new member.
I am Asta from Hage Village!
It is nice to meet all of you!
Talk about out in the sticks.
Hey, introduce him to the other members.
Well, you have already met him, but...
He is pretty gloomy, and you never know what he is thinking, but he is a good guy.
She will get in your face when she is drunk, but she is a good person.
I will not get in anyone's face.
Is not that a small village out in the boonies?
To come from out in the boonies and join the Magic Knights...
You must have worked really hard, little boy.
How about I reward you with a special treat?
I wish I could accept that!
But I already have a goddess named Sister Lily in my heart!
Let us continue with the introductions.
He loves to fight and is obsessed with battle, but he is a good guy.
This is my little sister Marie.
If you lay a finger on Marie, I will kill you.
He is a bit too obsessed with his little sister, but he is a good guy.
She eats way too much, but she is a good person.
I do not really get him, but he is a good guy.
And then we have Magna Swing.
He is a delinquent, but he is a good guy.
And last but not least, the captain of the Black Bulls,
He is not calling him a good guy?!
There are other members, but they are either on some mission,
taking a break, or slacking off.
Try to get along with them all.
I will super get along with them all!
Once again, it is nice to meet all of you!
Your height and the volume of your voice are all out of proportion.
Anyway, put him to work, but do not kill him.
Mister Yami said to put you to work.
I will gladly put you to work.
A weak-looking shrimp like you from a village like Hage out in the boonies...
I barely sense any mana from you.
And you are a new member of the Black Bulls?
I do not know what a hick like you with no magical powers
did to get on Mister Yami's good side, but...
You want one of these Black Bulls robes?
You want it that badly, huh?
You are going to have to convince me, Mister Yami's 1 man
and a real man's man, Magna Swing!
Time for your initiation into the Black Bulls.
If you want one of these robes, get through this trial I am about to give you.
He is making up initiation rituals again.
I want to do it, too!
First, show me just how much guts and stamina you have!
That kid's not bad, though this is pointless.
Not that it matters since magic is everything in this world,
but he has a crazy amount of energy.
I guess you have some guts.
Can I have my robe now?
You are a hick from the boonies!
It is not going to be that easy!
The final trial in the initiation!
You can use magic or whatever else you want...
to either block or dodge my attack magic!
If you are able to do that, you will officially be one of us Black Bulls.
You will get your precious robe!
Hold up your grimoire, you stupid shrimp!
With his well-trained muscles, kinetic vision, and explosive power,
Asta had always been able to slice through magic and defeat his enemies.
But Magna's magic was too fast for Asta to see.
Even if he could slice through it,
the momentum of this attack would continue.
He would just be hit by the split attack's halves.
Now that he had realized his limits, his brain shut down.
His body had not given up!
And he was able to find a way out!
It is been a while since we did not have to save a new recruit's hide.
He was not able to cut it, but he was able to hit it.
That sword can cut through magic as well as repel it.
I knew it could cut through magic, but I guess I can hit it, too.
But man, I thought I was going to die!
Was he planning to kill a new recruit?!
He took that head-on, and he is fine?!
I was able to nullify it in time, so I am fine,
but I was almost offed by my own magic.
Not only were you able to block my magic, you actually sent it right back at me!
Sorry I made fun of you for being a backwoods hick with little magical power.
I am actually from out in the country myself.
I am from Rayaka Village, just above Hage.
Rayaka Village is way out in the sticks!
Actually, it is not that I have little magical power.
I do not have any at all.
You do not have any magical power?
And yet you were able to hit my attack back at me?
Let us start the second initiation!
Let us try and kill each other!
You looked great out there, little boy.
Is not there something more important you should be doing?
And while we are at it...
Do not you think so, Mister Yami?
And now, you are officially a member of the Magic Knights Squad, the Black Bulls!
You better work hard not to shame Mister Yami or the Black Bulls!
It is a pleasure to work with all of you!
I will be more careful next time!
The captain just told you to shut up!
That is the other new recruit?
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
I have finally been acknowledged as a member of the Black Bulls!
Black Clover, Page 7: The Other New Recruit.
Not giving up is my magic!
